divs: sighting detailswalking out to my deck i noticed a very bright twinkling sorta strobing in the east an southeast horizon . i would say that if you were to hold up your index finger at arms length thats the distance from the horizon it stayed for the 5 hrs. that i watched it. it did not appear to movve at all. i have 25x100 astronomy binoculars which i viewed it with an i saw a partially red top and the rest just seemed to be constantly strobing, getting really dim at times to very very bright. this was wed. 11\18\09 7 pm til i went to bed. dateline 11\19\09, once again walked out on my back deck and the object was there and now i am very alarmed because its cloudy and raining. im continuing to watch the object and its raining harder and no other sky is exposed anywhere. came inside to check the radar and its covered in clouds and precepitation. the light is there thru the clouds and rain and i can say ive never herd or seen such a thing in my life. i am hoping that this will be reported on more extensivly. thanks for your service.
Summary: A bright flashing strobing light low on the eastern horizon
